results.title: Progressive development of melanoma-induced cachexia differentially impacts organ systems in mice
results.text_hl: @GENE_ACE @GENE_1636 @@@ACE@@@ inhibition with the anti-@DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ does not impede @<m>DISEASE_Wasting_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019282 @@@wasting@@@ but preserves muscle strength, and this occurs by impeding @DISEASE_Cachexia @DISEASE_MESH:D002100 @@@cachexia@@@-induced transcriptional changes.
